high_descs: Turn to your right then face the side table on your right
Pick up the pen on the table beside the lamp
Turn to your right and make a few step then face the lamp
Turn on the lamp
anns.task_desc: Examine the pen on the light

high_descs: turn to the right and take a few steps forward and turn to the right and go to the night stand
pick up the pen from the night stand
turn to the right and take a step and turn to the left facing the lamp on the desk
turn on the desk lamp
anns.task_desc: Examine a pen by the light of a desk lamp

high_descs: turn to your right and go to the end table with the green lamp
pick up a pen from the table
turn to your right then back to the end table
turn on the green lamp
anns.task_desc: turn on a lamp while holding a pen

high_descs: Move to the wood night stand to the right of the bed
Pick up the black pen behind the lamp on top of the night stand
Carry the pen then face the lamp on top of the night stand
Turn on the lamp
anns.task_desc: Pick up a pen while turning on a lamp on the night stand

high_descs: Turn around and go to the night stand.
Pick up the black pen.
Move to the right.
Turn on the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Look at the pen under the lamp.

high_descs: Turn around and find the small table beside the bed.
Pick up the pen from behind the lamp.
Hold the pen and look to the right.
Hold the pen and turn the lamp on.
anns.task_desc: Pick up a pen and turn on a lamp.
